job description:
Senior Data Analyst

Location: McLean, VA

Duration: 6-7 months

Description:
  • Analyzing business requirements and convert them in to data mapping for ETL development.
  • Provide expert level capability for data analysis required to translate requirements to detailed rules.
  • Provide peer reviews, tasks, and day-to-day support to others on the analyst team
  • Reviewing technical designs to ensure accurate and complete translation of business requirements into detailed system level requirements
  • Writing system-level requirements per the selected methodology functional process models, user stories, software requirement specifications
  • Analyzing business requirements to independently convert them into detailed system requirements and functional specifications
  • Providing input into proposed solutions, identify impacts, risks and issues, and work with technical and business staff to implement proposed solutions
  • Assist in providing or facilitating the resolutions to an extensive range of complicated problems.
  • Prioritizing assignments and working independently to ensure work is completed on schedule, within budget, and meets customer expectations
Key to success in this role
  • Strong analytical mindset and process skills
  • Ability to work with data to create rules for in ETL process.
  • Ability to work in a dynamic, rapidly changing environment
  • Ability to elicit, analyze, document, and validate the system requirements that support the business requirements for the systems supported
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills
  • Ability to develop mutually beneficial relationships with both technical and business teams
  • Demonstrates customer service and intrapersonal best practices
  • Ability to work independently and with business partners at various levels of the organization
  • Works under minimal supervision. Able to provide technical guidance to the team.
  • Good communication and team player.
  • Strong written and oral communications skills.
Qualifications
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related area of study or equivalent combination of education and/or relevant work experience
  • 5 years' experience with system requirements
  • 5 years' experience supporting key business applications
  • 5 Years of strong SQL experience
  • 5 Years' experience in Data mapping and ETL process development
  • Capable and willing to receive work direction from direct and indirect leadership
  • Strong analytical and technical problem-solving skills
  • Ability to develop decision criteria and unbiased technology comparisons
Preferred Skills
  • Prior Mortgage-banking industry experience a strong plus
  • Graduate degree or advanced studies
  • Experience with DOORS and Version One
  • Experience with ETL tools
  • Excellent analytical, comprehension, communication, writing, and interpersonal skills
  • Education Level: Bachelor's degree
  • Years' Experience: 4
Competency Description Proficiency Years' Experience

100255 Business Analysis Medium 3 - 5 Years

101525 SQL High 5 - 7 Years
